name: Ooh
description: Autumn time often brings with it a lot of work, and sometimes you just want to take a nap in a chair in front of a burning fireplace and enjoy the peace and quiet. Main character of the game Mr. ooh is a brownie, he is very responsible and economic, so he immediately responds the request to take care of his old friend's grandfather. The player will have to help the old man with his to-do list and take care of the house for a while. This is a short but touching story about real friends who are ready to help each other out even after many years.
